channel.title: [urgent]PLAYER FILES NOT SAVING![/urgent]
channel.description:
okay on my server, peoples files are not saving correctly, there files are being reset minutely!@#
my server is in crises! (ur probably laff'ing atm.. its not funny)
i kick some1, it rolls them back...
i restart server, EVERYONE gets rolled back a while ago
ppl get disconnected/glitched, ROLLED BACK!
I NEED HELP ASAP1!!!!@!@!@!

item.title: [urgent]PLAYER FILES NOT SAVING![/urgent]
item.dc:creator: @djspanke djspanke

@djspanke wrote:

I’m new to java and coding so i can’t give one… But you could try taking the code for saving before logout and making it out of that but fallen i think has the best idea

item.title: [urgent]PLAYER FILES NOT SAVING![/urgent]
item.dc:creator: @fallen_angel666 fallen_angel666
item.description:
@fallen_angel666 wrote:

LISTEN!!! this has happened before… it simpily means you have ran out of memory.
i suggest you delete any unactive accounts. i kept my server file on a flashdrive and it ran out of memory, so i have been there.

Read full topic

item.title: [urgent]PLAYER FILES NOT SAVING![/urgent]
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

jc, idk but i think this is wat ur asking for…

found this in process:

if(smitimer > 0){ smitimer -= 1;} if(smitimer <= 1) { savechar(); savemoreinfo(); savefile = true; if(savemoreinfo()) { attempts = 0; smitimer = 10; } else if(!savemoreinfo() && attempts <= 5) { println_debug("Error saving moreinfo file! Retrying in 5 seconds"); println_debug("Attempts: "+attempts); attempts += 1; smitimer = 5; } else if(!savemoreinfo() && attempts >= 5) { println_debug("Attempts: "+attempts+" - Giving up saving moreinfo file!"); attempts += 1; smitimer = 99999999; } }

logout methods:

public void logout(){ SQL.createConnection(); SQL.saveHighScore(this); SQL.destroyConnection(); savefile = true; savechar(); outStream.createFrame(109); }

and also…

case 9154: // Log out { if (LogoutDelay >= 1) { sendMessage( "You must wait 10 seconds after combat to log out!"); } else if (LogoutDelay == 0) { //logout(); savefile = true; savechar(); SQL.createConnection(); SQL.saveHighScore(this); SQL.destroyConnection(); logout(); } } break;

Read full topic
